full_threads.body:
featuring our new premium Seating product!
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Hi there,

We're here to bring you the latest product updates from The Events Calendar. Read below for all of the details.

⚙️ Product Updates for October 2024
The Events Calendar and Add-ons

Event Tickets 5.16.0.1

The latest version of Event Tickets resolves a fatal error that prevented the Sessions table from being set up on some databases with stricter settings.

Event Tickets Plus 6.1.0

This version of Event Tickets Plus now has the new premium Seating product for Event Tickets integration!

Event Tickets 5.16.0

The latest version of Event Tickets introduces a new premium Seating option for selling tickets with assigned seating!

Events Calendar Pro 7.3.0

This latest version of Events Calendar Pro now has the new premium Seating product for Event Tickets integration!

The Events Calendar 6.8.0

The latest update of The Events Calendar now has the new premium Seating product for Event Tickets integration!

Eventbrite Tickets 4.6.15

The latest version of Eventbrite Tickets updates with the new JavaScript embed for Eventbrite checkout, instead of the `iframe` which was deprecated and no longer worked.

The Events Calendar 6.7.1

The latest update of The Events Calendar now allows importing custom data when importing Organizers & Venues from a CSV file.

Community 5.0.5

The latest Community version updates organizer and venue validation to only require name rather than all fields.

Events Calendar Pro 7.2.1

This latest version of Events Calendar Pro has several fixes, including the styling of the "Fix geolocation data" on Maps settings and a styling issue with Kadence where the calendar was wider than the content container.

Event Tickets 5.15.0

The latest version of Event Tickets has several fixes including fatal on the Order Completed page and improved query speeds.

Stay Awesome,
Nathan B. Weller

The Events Calendar Team 🤘

You're receiving this because you purchased a product or opted in to marketing
